participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, enjoys sharing experiences from her life.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i am retired and living the great life. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, loves connecting with others and sharing interests.
participant_2.background: my parents were also teachers. i'm an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going? ðŸ˜Š
hi there. I'm at school because i'm an elementary school teacher. Have you been to school?
that's awesome ! i actually wrote a biography on jenifer lawerence once time
i don't really know her. my parents were also teachers and never told me about her. How old are you?
i am always cooking dinner to ensure family time at least at the dinner table what are you up to tonight ?
having a webcam chat. Would you join?
i've a gym in my own home and can not motivate myself .
well just do something else then. i love to play board games. have you tried it?
that's great . i like to eat , and i hate cleaning how are you this evening ?
my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once this evening. Will you come with me?
great ! my nickname is jay and i am 19 years old . do you have hobbies ? ðŸ˜œ
for vacation i enjoy time at the beach and reading. what is your hobbies?
nice . have you read anything good lately ?
i'm in toronto . we are japanese immigrants .
